name: 3-D Modelling
content:
Are you someone with an avant-garde artistic perspective?
Ashwamedha presents to you a 3-D modelling contest for everyone out there with a creative mind and a spark of passion for 3-D softwares.
Rules and Regulations
  • • Participants have to create & render a scene based on the given reference image and they are free to use any 3-D software of their choice.
  • • This is an online event.
  • • Upload your final render and a screenshot of your work and Title your image as your registered name.
  • • Renders should be of good quality.
  • • Cheating will NOT be tolerated.

Don't let anything stop you... Connect your creative neurons and give your vision a 3D walkthrough... ✨ 🎨

⌛ Registration Deadline - Monday, 19 December 2022 23:00
💸 Entry Fee - ₹50
🎁 Prize Pool- ₹2500

For queries, contact:
Govind R: 7994322639
Hari Krishnan T: 8589897989

name: King of Trolls
content:
Do you think you can uphold the position of a stress buster among the gang??....
For those who work behind the keyboards here comes the oppurtunity to showcase your inner turmoil, ''🅺︎🅸︎🅽︎🅶︎ 🅾︎🅵︎ 🆃︎🆁︎🅾︎🅻︎🅻︎🆂︎''.
The winners can get their hands on the amazing 🅿︎🆁︎🅸︎🅲︎🅴︎ 🅿︎🅾︎🅾︎🅻︎ of ₹2500/-

Topic: CAMPUS LIFE

RULES & REGULATIONS
  • 🔸General rules of Ashwamedha'22 are applicable for this event.
  • 🔸This is an online event.
  • 🔸 This is an individual event.
  • 🔸Troll can be made on any software.
  • 🔸 If any malpractices are noticed will lead to disqualification of the troll.
  • 🔸The troll should be related to the given topic.
  • 🔸The troll should not contain any personal criticism/attack.
  • 🔸The troll should be immaculate of obscenity.
  • 🔸Trolls can be either in English/Malayalam. Original Trolls created by individuals are only eligible for the contest.
  • 🔸Trolls should be watermarked as 'King of Trolls-Ashwamedha2k2'.
  • 🔸Only the entries shared to submit link within the time are considered for competition.
  • 🔸Evaluation criteria is based on the number of likes in Instagram.
  • 🔸Time allotted for uploading the entries are upto 5pm on 21 December,2022.
  • 🔸All of the contestants are required to send the photo of your College ID along with the troll.
  • 🔸If the trolls you send doesn't satisfy any one of the rules mentioned above will directly get rejected.

For queries contact:
HARISHANKAR SHAJI C: 9946346973
SWETHA S : 9562171963

💸Entry Fee - Free
🎁 Prize Pool- ₹2500

name: Valorant
content:
Get well dressed and well armed, think quicker than lightning to take out the team.🔥
Team up with your friends for an adrenaline-filled clash as Ashwamedha presents to you a 5v5 VALORANT Tournament.

So, who's ready to show some special abilities and firepower.🔫🥷🏻

Rules and Regulations
  • • General Rules of Ashwamedha'22 are applicable for this event.
  • • This is a team event.
  • • A team should consist of 5 members.
  • • The first team to win all the 13 rounds wins the game.
  • • Estimated game length per match is 30-40 mins.
  • • Players can select agents of their interest.
  • • Play from your orginal riot game accounts.

So what are you waiting for!? Take your guns, load your powers, and show the world what you've got!!✨

For queries contact:
Abhijith: 8075531983
Amaan: 8078246990

💸 Registration fee : ₹200/team
🎁 Prize Money : ₹2000

name: Spark Plug
content:
A tiny spark is sufficient to enlighten oneself or to bring out something new.

So here begins the adventure with sparks within and those on the components.

For those awaiting hands here comes a wonderful opportunity, 𝗦𝗣𝗔𝗥𝗞 𝗣𝗟𝗨𝗚 to test and release the energy within you. Do not miss the event on 𝟸𝟸 𝙳𝚎𝚌𝚎𝚖𝚋𝚎𝚛 𝟸𝟶𝟸𝟸 at 𝘈𝘚𝘐𝘌𝘛.

Rules and Regulations
  • 🔸 General rules of Ashwamedha'22 are applicable for this event.
  • 🔸Team comprising of two members are allowed.
  • 🔸Each teams should pass three levels of the game inorder to reach the finish line.
  • 🔸The last level determines the winner which depends on the accuracy of finishing.

    The order of levels as follows:
    • 📎coil gun
    • 📎buzz wire game
    • 📎circuit build up

  • 🔸Usage of phone after entering the game or during the game is prohibited.
  • 🔸Should follow the safely instructions that are provided by the Invigilator.
  • 🔸All the activities are observed by the Invigilator if any damage is done there would be penalty.
  • 🔸Invigilators liberal decision is final.
  • 🔸All the rules and regulation of the game and the college are mandatory.
  • 🔸No refunds are applicable.


💸Registration Fee: 100 per head

For more queries contact,
Indrajith Kiran: 73060 74178
Navin Varghese: 9745915771

name: FIFA Versus
content:
What are you waiting for,let’s football ⚽ !!
So for all the Diligent players,ASHWAMEDHA ’22 🐎 presents EA sports FIFA competition.

Rules and Regulations:
  • 🏈General rules of ASHWAMEDHA ‘22 are applicable for this event. This is an Individual event.
  • 🏈Match Format: Players go head-to-head in two 4-minute halves.
  • 🏈Tournament Format: Knockout (changes according to number of registration).
  • 🏈Controller: PC wired controller gamepad. If both players draw a match, the Winner will be decided by Penalties(even after the extra time score goes the same).
  • 🏈Players can pause the game twice, but in the event of pausing the game while the ball is with the opponent will lead to disqualification.
  • 🏈Only standard teams are allowed.
  • 🏈The decision of judges would be final.

⚜️ Registration Fee : 100/head

For further details contact,
ABHAY SANKAR : 8111891175

name: Game of Rooms
content:
𝑨𝒓𝒆 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒔𝒐𝒎𝒆𝒐𝒏𝒆 𝒘𝒉𝒐 𝒊𝒔 𝒇𝒂𝒔𝒄𝒊𝒏𝒂𝒕𝒆𝒅 𝒊𝒏 𝒑𝒍𝒂𝒚𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒈𝒂𝒎𝒆𝒔?

ASHWAMEDHA ᴘʀᴇꜱᴇɴᴛꜱ ᴛᴏ ʏᴏᴜ ~ ɢᴀᴍᴇ ᴏꜰ ʀᴏᴏᴍꜱ

Grab a friend of yours and register now. Show up and get locked in. Win all the games to escape the room.

Rule and Regulations :
  • 🔸 General rules of Ashwamedha'22 are applicable for this event.
  • 🔶 A team of 2 members can participate
  • 🔶 A total of 16 boxes with 26 doors are setup in a room
  • 🔶 Each box contain a game or a task to complete
  • 🔶 There will be a starting and ending box
  • 🔶 Each team have to enter the game from the starting box
  • 🔶 The door to next box will depend upon the completion of the task
  • 🔶 The team to complete the exit box task with minimal time will be declared as the winners

𝑵𝒆𝒗𝒆𝒓 𝒍𝒆𝒕 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒇𝒆𝒂𝒓 𝒐𝒇 𝒔𝒕𝒓𝒊𝒌𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒐𝒖𝒕 𝒌𝒆𝒆𝒑 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒇𝒓𝒐𝒎 𝒑𝒍𝒂𝒚𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒈𝒂𝒎𝒆.

name: Gears of War
content:
The arena is ready. Are you? 🥊
Do you and your robot have what it takes to conquer the battlefield and come out on top? Now's your chance to prove yourself ✨ ASHWAMEDHA '22 🐎 presents ⚙️GEARS OF WAR⚙️, where man and machine work as one. Witness an epic showdown between battlebots!! 🔥

When the dust settles, there will only be one left standing....

BATTLEBOT SPECIFICATIONS
  • 🔹The robots may be wired or wireless.
  • 🔹The robot, at it's maximum size (including all retractable projections and extensions) must fit into a box of dimensions 50cm*50cm*50cm. Measurements will be taken just before the start of the match.
  • 🔹Weight must not exceed 25kgs.
  • 🔹Battery power can be a maximum of 24 volts.
  • 🔹Weapons are not allowed. Flip bots, wedge bots and cutter bots are not allowed.
RULES AND REGULATIONS
  • 🔹General rules of ASHWAMEDHA '22 are applicable for this event.
  • 🔹Each team may have a maximum of 4 members.
  • 🔹Cross-college teams are not allowed.
  • 🔹Participants of any degree below Post-graduate (PG) are allowed to participate.
  • 🔹If the robot hasn't moved from it's spot for more than 60 seconds, it will lead to disqualification.
  • 🔹Event manager's decision is final.
  • 🔹If there isn't a minimum of 7 teams participating in the competition, there may be variation in the prize pool.
⚜️ Registration fee : Rs 500/- per team
For any queries contact:
Deril: 79940 41637
Varun: 9567822308

name: Paintball
content:

  • 🔸 wiping off paint hits while still on the field.
  • 🔸Offer your opponent the opportunity to surrender if you are within 20 ft.
  • 🔸Once eliminated, raise your gun and arm over your head and move quickly toward the exit.

Come join us for an action-packed day of paintball!

🔫 Experience the thrill of the game as you battle your way through the enemy's territory. Bring your friends to join in the fun. Enjoy a day of intense competition and camaraderie. We guarantee a day of exciting and unforgettable entertainment. So what are you waiting for?

Come and join us for a day of paintball!
